Meet the Fleet

We rather like the new 5 door Kia Rio. Actually, we are not alone.

What Car describe it as ‘worthy of comparison with the best cars in the supermini class’, and Autocar give it 4.5 stars out of 5. Over 2,500 owners on reevoo give their Rio a score of 8.9 out of 10.

Plenty of room inside, Bluetooth enabled, two 12v power sockets to keep your phone charged, DAB radio with USB and aux connections ... the list goes on. We supply a spare phone charger to prevent arguments, and aux cables so you can argue over whose music to listen to.

If you need child seats or a bike rack let us know and we will have them fitted for you. Looking for ideas on where to go? We include suggested trips based on the duration of your hire.

Looking for something for a special day? Get in touch and ask about our Mercedes 220

Check out our News section for our latest offers.

Interested? Get in touch.
